org.antfarmer.ejce.parameter

Interface AsymmetricAlgorithmParameters<T extends AsymmetricAlgorithmParameters<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the concrete type of this object
    All Superinterfaces:
    AlgorithmParameters<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAsymmetricAlgorithmParameters, ElGamalParameters, RsaParameters

    public interface AsymmetricAlgorithmParameters<T extends AsymmetricAlgorithmParameters<T>>
extends AlgorithmParameters<T>
    Interface for initializing asymmetric encryption algorithms.

    • Method Summary

      • setEncryptionKeyLoader

        T setEncryptionKeyLoader(Object encryptionKeyLoader)
        Sets the KeyLoader, which is used to load the encryption key. The value may either be the full class name of a KeyLoader implementation or an actual KeyLoader instance.
        Parameters:
        encryptionKeyLoader - The encryptionKeyLoader to set.
        Returns:
        this concrete class
